commands.name: !status [TICKER] [NETWORK]
commands.description: Displays detailed information about a specific KRC20 token.
details: TICKER: The token's ticker symbol (e.g., TNACHO, KAS)
Provides information such as maximum supply, minted amount, circulation supply, and top holders.

commands.name: !balance [WALLET_ADDRESS] [NETWORK]
commands.description: Shows the KRC20 token balances for a specific wallet address.
details: WALLET_ADDRESS: A valid Kaspa wallet address
Displays all KRC20 token balances associated with the provided address on the specified network.

commands.name: !links
commands.description: Provides a list of official links related to the project.
details: Displays links to official websites, social media, and other relevant resources.

commands.name: !donate
commands.description: Shows information about how to donate to the project.
details: Provides the official donation wallet address.
Includes a link to check the donation wallet's balance.

commands.name: !helpmenu
commands.description: Displays this help menu with detailed information about available commands.
details: Shows a list of all available commands with their descriptions and usage instructions.
